title: Health For Life Naturopathic Medicine
description: Health For Life Naturopathic Medicine offers Arizona families with naturopathic treatments and healthcare alongside with women's health, pediatrics, midwifery, and many more alternative medicine practices.

Once you truly embrace this medicine, your outlook on health and life will forever be enhanced."Dr. Krystal Tellier, NMD, CPM The Health For Life Doctors are uniquely equipped to assist with biodentical hormone support for both men and women. Dr. Tellier sees children of all ages. She provides naturopathic medical oversight of common childhood concerns and can also perform physical exams necessary for school and athletic participation.
